item.title: How to make new npc's
item.dc:creator: @x_rush_x x rush x
item.description:
@x_rush_x wrote:

open autospawn.cfg ull see this or something like it but alot bigger.

[code]//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 3449 3251 3430 0 0 0 0 0 0 online thing
spawn = 3449 3255 3430 0 0 0 0 0 0 online thing

spawn = 2862 2911 3612 0 0 0 0 0 0 Death
spawn = 1019 2917 3610 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell)

spawn = 1019 2917 3620 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell)
spawn = 83 2907 3611 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell)

spawn = 1019 2906 3615 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell)[/code]

now just add on to the bottum[br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2007, 05:49:31 PM[/size][hr]and the squars are just spaces
